variable.name: SAMPLE_USE
variable.description: Sample Use. Array_SNP: SNP genotypes obtained using standard or custom microarrays; Imputation_SNP: Imputed SNP genotypes

variable.name: SAMPLE_SOURCE
variable.description: Coriell for HapMap samples, source repository for investigator controls, blank otherwise.

variable.name: SOURCE_SAMPLE_ID
variable.description: Coriell ID for HapMap samples, repository ID for investigator controls, blank otherwise.
